Let us create dice roll model

```{r}
roll <- function(){
  dice <- sample(1:6, 2, replace = TRUE, prob = c(1/7, 1/7, 1/7, 1/7, 1/7, 2/7))
  return(sum(dice))
}
```

```{r}
roll()
```
```{r}
rolls <- replicate(10000, roll())
qplot(rolls, binwidth = 1)
```
